attributes.action: explain and investigate as to the content of the mysterious white chemtrails (contrails) that are commonly sprayed from aircraft at high attitude and do not disappear  for some hours..
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: An explanation is needed as to what is going on in the skies, whether the spraying is some form of climate control experiment or if it is just badly maintained foreign aircraft. These chemtrails are distinctively different to aircraft contrails which gases can be seen for several hours compared to an average 15 seconds for a contrail. With so much conflicting information on the internet, some with sinister undertones, the population of Great Britain need to made aware of what is going on with the spraying which is happening above them.
